DOC.brief_title: Accuracy Amniotic Fluid Lamellar Body Counting Evaluating Fetal Lung Maturity
DOC.detailed_description: Respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) one important cause mortality neonates . This study design evaluate amniotic fluid lamellar body count predict fetal lung maturity .
DOC.criteria: Women , 2837 week gestational age , decide terminate pregnancy , enrol study Chorioamnionitis Intra Uterine Fetal Death ( IUFD ) Blood amniotic fluid Rupture placenta patient dissatisfaction exclusion criterion .
